message: Let's use this thread for any comments coming out of the conference.
If anyone finds a particularly good, reliable stream source, please post it here for the rest of us.
I'll be trying out Xboxgaming.co.za and GameTrailers.
I'm on Gametrailers, you guys hearing sound?
Nevermind, got sound
Summer of Arcade just announced on GT. Includes Insanely Twisted Shadow Planet, Fruit Ninja Kinect, Toy Soldiers 2, From Dust and Bastion (?) from Warner Bros.
Xboxgaming's stream seems really good quality -- better than GT's.
OK, am here.  Sounds like it's teh snooze so far?  Not even trying to compete with the other two platform holders launching new hardware?
CoD is so ridiculously scripted these days, they might as well just announce that MW3 is a Kinect-exclusive on-rails shooter.
Tomb Raider - looks - awesome!
Just what u
Just what I always wanted - the magic of Fable in an on-rails shooter
If this show gets any more boring, I won't be able to stay awake for the other conferences.
I've not seen anything 360 related to really get excited about so far. They're really pushing Kinect though.
The Sports game warrants stage time? Really?!
It ended after Tomb Raider I'm afraid.
Lightsaber, on!
My god, they're totally the new Nintendo. And not in a good way.
You know what, for the squad commands, it could actually be neat, but I've been burnt too much by voice activation in the past. For conversation it's just ... maaan.
It's harder for me to actually watch the pressers now than it was before. :(
Ahaha, man, that voice activation in ME3 bit sure was a good use of Bioware's time, eh?

Yeah, precisely.

Plus side, Tomb Raider looks AMAZING.
It's amazing that at no point in development someone said "couldn't you just press a button?".
Xbox. Delay. Now.
I suppose it's not a complete loss -- I want to play Halo CE, Halo 4, Dance Central 2 and possibly Minecraft -- but man, what an underwhelming bore of a show.
Tomb Raider? Hell yes, a whole bunch of gameplay footage... on par with Uncharted... Mmm... :)
Yes, Tomb Raider is looking absolutely amazing. Crystal Dynamics has impressed me since Gex and Pandemonium to date. What an underrated development studio.
Was more shown than the trailer?
Wow, that looks incredible. Lara's a bit noisy, but wow.
Because cloud saves weren't so much as mentioned during the show. They had to save stage time for the real megatons like Kinect Disneyland.

Catching up now…

Why didn't anyone mention cloud saves?  And "beacons" sound cool too.
Yeah, but I thought he'd left her for dead!
Hey, Darric, you're right — Lara has learned a few lessons from Drake.  Looking good.

"Sometime during a round of Kinect Sports: Season Two golf, those who neither want nor plan to physically act out their games would have probably wondered what planet they were on. Is it the one we were living on before Wii made a fortune, where Microsoft now acts like an alien? Or is it the one on which Kinect just became the fastest-selling consumer device ever, making this mutation of Xbox 360 - evolution isn't the word, somehow - a foregone conclusion? When the biggest reveal of the evening is a "new trilogy" starting with Halo 4 via a remake of Halo 1, talk of possibilities is about as next-gen as it gets. " 

http://www.next-gen.biz/features/microsoft-press-conference-report
It's only fair given how much Drake cribbed from Lara. :o

Really, Microsoft?

http://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2011-06-07-wireless-steering-wheel-for-xbox-360

I mean, REALLY?  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EHlN21ebeak
But I am the controller :-/ *confused*

It's perplexing how Microsoft left so many of its most exciting stuff out of its conference. First the cloud saves, then a TRIALS HD SEQUEL (!!!), and now, The Deepak Chopra Project for Kinect. They could've won E3 with that one!

http://www.gametrailers.com/video/e3-2011-the-deepak/715049

Ahahahahaha*cry*

I'm selling my Xbox.
